Welcome to Pata Nyumba

Pata Nyumba is Kenyaâ€™s leading platform for finding rental homes that suit your needs. Whether you're looking for a bedsitter, a one-bedroom, or a family house, we connect you to the best deals across Nairobi and beyond.

Wide Variety of Listings

Explore hundreds of properties across different locations in Kenya, all verified for quality and affordability.

Trusted by Tenants & Landlords

We bridge the gap between tenants and property owners, ensuring a smooth renting experience for all.

Accurate Location Data

Our platform integrates Google Maps to help you find houses near you with real-time location detection.

Secure & Reliable

We ensure all listings are genuine, providing you with a trustworthy and hassle-free house-hunting experience.

); }; export default AboutUs;
